revised_title: Papers Read to the Society: November 21, 1901
tldr: This article discusses the process of producing specific anti-sera, which are used in medical research. The author explains the technical methods of creating anti-sera, such as injecting human blood into rabbits, and describes the literature on the subject. The article also mentions other papers read at the society meeting, including topics like skin currents, hair turning white, and Stonehenge's orientation.
